functions.description: Creates a multi-series line chart using the same specification as the taskpane. Data format: Column 1 = X-axis values (dates/categories), Columns 2-n = Value series for multiple lines
functions.name: LINE

parameters.description: Data range with headers. Column 1: X-axis values (often dates/time or categories), Columns 2-n: Value series for multiple lines
parameters.name: data

result.description: Status message indicating chart creation success or error details
